goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans

Class RepositoryGoal<A extends Atom,U extends Update>

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans.RepositoryGoal<A,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - - The type of atom associated with the KRT that is used with the goals that instances of this class represent.
    U - - The type of update associated with the KRT that is used with the goals that instances of this class represent.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrologRepositoryGoal

    public abstract class RepositoryGoal<A extends Atom,U extends Update>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a goal in a goal repository as implemented by subclasses of GoalRepository. The convenience of this class lies in the representation of goals: rather than as an update, this class represents as sets of atoms.
    Author:
    sungshik

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The goal as a set of atoms.

      protected abstract void initAtoms()
      Initializes the set of atoms, which is KRT specific, hence an abstract method.
